attributes.action: Have a explanation of democracy explained to both houses.
attributes.background:
Politicians seem to have forgot that they work for the people who are told democracy is the only way, we even promote it around the world & then politicians try to ignore it, we have had mps expenses, 10% pay rises for mps ,
Self confessed questionable behaviour, now they wont to ignore democracy.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take specific action.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
